00035  *
00036  * lustre/include/lustre/ll_fiemap.h
00037  *
00038  * FIEMAP data structures and flags. This header file will be used until
00039  * fiemap.h is available in the upstream kernel.
00040  *
00041  * Author: Kalpak Shah <kalpak.shah@sun.com>
00042  * Author: Andreas Dilger <adilger@sun.com>
00043  */
00044 
00045 #ifndef _LUSTRE_FIEMAP_H
00046 #define _LUSTRE_FIEMAP_H
00047 
00048 #ifndef __KERNEL__
00049 #include <stddef.h>
00050 #include <linux/fiemap.h>
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 /* XXX: We use fiemap_extent::fe_reserved[0] */
00054 #define fe_device       fe_reserved[0]
00055 
00056 static inline size_t fiemap_count_to_size(size_t extent_count)
00057 {
00058         return sizeof(struct fiemap) + extent_count *
00059                                        sizeof(struct fiemap_extent);
00060 }
00061 
00062 static inline unsigned fiemap_size_to_count(size_t array_size)
00063 {
00064         return (array_size - sizeof(struct fiemap)) /
00065                sizeof(struct fiemap_extent);
00066 }
00067 
00068 #define FIEMAP_FLAG_DEVICE_ORDER 0x40000000 /* return device ordered mapping */
00069 
00070 #ifdef FIEMAP_FLAGS_COMPAT
00071 #undef FIEMAP_FLAGS_COMPAT
00072 #endif
00073 
00074 /* Lustre specific flags - use a high bit, don't conflict with upstream flag */
00075 #define FIEMAP_EXTENT_NO_DIRECT 0x40000000 /* Data mapping undefined */
00076 #define FIEMAP_EXTENT_NET       0x80000000 /* Data stored remotely.
00077                                             * Sets NO_DIRECT flag */
00078 
00079 #endif /* _LUSTRE_FIEMAP_H */
